The server URL for the database connection.

Sets the activation status of a shop account to activated.

Sets the ID of the logged-in consumer.
setID(String) - Method in class databaseConnection.ShopDBConn
Sets the shop ID for this connection.
ShopDBConn - Class in databaseConnection
This class provides methods for shop database operations such as activating accounts, logging in, changing passwords and names, lending and receiving cups, and querying cup holdings.
ShopDBConn() - Constructor for class databaseConnection.ShopDBConn
Constructs a ShopDBConn object and establishes a connection to the database.
ShopFrame - Class in shopProgram
This class represents the frame for shop operations, allowing shops to rent and return cups, check currently held cups, change password, and logout.
ShopFrame(ShopDBConn) - Constructor for class shopProgram.ShopFrame
Constructs a new ShopFrame with the given ShopDBConn and initializes the UI components.
shopInfo() - Method in class databaseConnection.PlatformDBConn
Retrieves information about all shop accounts.
ShopMain - Class in shopProgram
The main class for the Shop application.
ShopMain() - Constructor for class shopProgram.ShopMain
Constructs the ShopMain class.
ShopOperationsFrame - Class in shopProgram
The ShopOperationsFrame class provides a GUI for shop activation and login.
ShopOperationsFrame(ShopDBConn) - Constructor for class shopProgram.ShopOperationsFrame
Constructs a ShopOperationsFrame with the given database connection.
shopProgram - package shopProgram
This package contains classes related to the shop GUI program.
shopSignUp(String, String, String) - Method in class databaseConnection.PlatformDBConn
Signs up a new shop with the given ID, name, and activation password.
SignupAndLoginExceptions - Class in databaseConnection
This class contains custom exceptions for signup and login operations.
SignupAndLoginExceptions() - Constructor for class databaseConnection.SignupAndLoginExceptions
 
SignupAndLoginExceptions.AccountNotExistException - Exception in databaseConnection
Exception thrown when an account does not exist.
SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdAlreadyUsedException - Exception in databaseConnection
Exception thrown when an ID is already used.
SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdCantEmptyException - Exception in databaseConnection
Exception thrown when the ID is empty.
SignupAndLoginExceptions.InitialPasswordCantEmptyException - Exception in databaseConnection
Exception thrown when the initial password is empty.
SignupAndLoginExceptions.NotActivateException - Exception in databaseConnection
Exception thrown when the account is not activated.
SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordAlreadyUsedException - Exception in databaseConnection
Exception thrown when a password is already used.
SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordCantEmptyException - Exception in databaseConnection
Exception thrown when the login password is empty.
SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordWrongException - Exception in databaseConnection
Exception thrown when the password is incorrect.
signUpIDCheck(String) - Method in class databaseConnection.PlatformDBConn
Checks if the given ID is already used in the Shop_Accounts table.
singUpIDCheck(String) - Method in class databaseConnection.ConsumerDBConn
Checks if the given ID is already used during sign-up.
